title: De Havilland Canada - Wikipedia
snippet: The ownership of the certificates gave Viking the exclusive right to manufacture new aircraft; previously, Viking had purchased in May 2005 the right to manufacture spares and distribute the de Havilland heritage aircraft product line. In addition to the de Havilland type certificates, Viking Air also acquired the Canadair CL-415 program in October 2018. In November 2018, Viking Air parent Longview Aviation Capital acquired the Bombardier Dash 8 program and the de Havilland brand from Bombardier, in a deal that was expected to close by the second half of 2019.

title: Viking Air - Wikipedia
snippet: He retired as president of Viking Air in 1987. The company is a subsidiary of Longview Aviation Capital, which is owned by Sherry Brydson, granddaughter of deceased newspaper magnate Roy Thomson and cousin of David Thomson, parties of the largest family fortune in Canada.
